name: ECHORIA: Ancient Echoes DEMO
description:
ECHORIA: Ancient Echoes is a new, immersive story-based RPG by Adam Waind.
This is Chapter 1 of a planned 6 games.

Discover the secrets of the Ancients and learn their magic. Defeat powerful foes with unique strategies.
Enjoy rich cinematics and atmospheric environments accompanied by a hand-chosen soundtrack of over 100 songs!

It offers tons of replayability.
Choose different characters or skills to build throughout new playthroughs.
Make any character a tank or a glass-cannon with over 200 pieces of unique gear to find and choose from!

Join Aldus, a hunter from the snowy Borra Village who finds the routine of hunting mundane and tedious.
He wants nothing more than to challenge his mind and discover his latent talent for leadership.
But be careful what you wish for, because the greatest challenge lies ahead!

Swept along by the motives of others, Aldus must adapt to his ever changing surroundings.

Who can he trust? Who will he become?

The answers lie within the journey to discover the Ancients!

The fate of the world lies on the decisions of 5 adventurers:

 Aldus, the Hunter

  Crow, the Thief

  Ranheim, the Knight

  Sasha, the Paladin

  Ka'imi, the Mage



  • Experience a story rich in lore and emotion
  • Explore new areas and solve puzzles
  • Choose 3 characters to develop in combat
  • Combo skills by reacting with the correct inputs
  • Improve your skills with the Skill Mastery System
  • Create new and interesting strategies with over 200 unique pieces of gear

Any feedback is appreciated!

Anyone in the credits will receive a FREE COPY of the game once it hits Steam!
